ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe B Electron fluxes 2-60 MeV and proton fluxes 20-120 MeV from ECT/REPT
ResourceHeader.Description: Electron fluxes 2-60 MeV and proton fluxes 20-120 MeV from ECT/REPT

InformationURL.Name: Van Allen Probes Science Gateway
InformationURL.Description: Science Gateway (including Mission Rules of the Road for Data Usage)

NASA Space Physics Data Facility (SPDF) CDAWeb.

Parameter.Name: Epoch
Parameter.Caveats: The midpoint of the sample time.

Parameter.Name: Satellite position (GEO)
Parameter.Description: [Time-series] Position of the satellite in geographic coordinates
Parameter.Caveats: Origin = Earths center of mass. X = Intersection of Greenwich meridian and geographic equator. Z = Geographic North Pole. Y = completes a right-handed Cartesian triad

Parameter.Name: Position_Quality
Parameter.Caveats: 0 denotes highest quality.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic field strength
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Equatorial magnetic field strength
Parameter.Description: ---> Calculated magnetic field strength at magnetic equator
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: McIlwains L parameter
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Roederers L* parameter
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Adiabatic invariant (bounce)
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Local Time
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Satellite position (GEO)
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] Position of the satellite in geographic coordinates
Parameter.Caveats: Origin = Earths center of mass. X = Intersection of Greenwich meridian and geographic equator. Z = Geographic North Pole. Y = completes a right-handed Cartesian triad

Parameter.Name: Magnetic field strength
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Equatorial magnetic field strength
Parameter.Description: ---> Calculated magnetic field strength at magnetic equator
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: McIlwains L parameter
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Roederers L* parameter
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Adiabatic invariant (bounce)
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Local Time
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Equat. Pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated using ONERA-DESP library Internal field: DGRF/IGRF External field: Olson & Pfitzer quiet

Parameter.Name: Data_Quality
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether the data is valid or invalid per spin of the satellite.
Parameter.Caveats: 0 = valid data; 1 = timing err; 2 = bias_st off; 3 = timing err and bias_st off

Parameter.Name: REPT FEDO
Parameter.Description: [EMPTY} FEDO - Omnidirectional Differential Electron Flux 2-60 MeV (spectrogram)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 12 electron energy bins.

Parameter.Name: REPT FEDO
Parameter.Description: ---> FEDO - Omnidirectional Differential Electron Flux 2-60 MeV (stacked time series)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 12 electron energy bins.

Parameter.Name: FEDO_Energy
Parameter.Caveats: The centers of the electron energy bins.  The Value Uncertainty contains the plus/minus range for each bin.

Parameter.Name: FEDO_Energy_DELTA_VAR
Parameter.Caveats: The plus/minus width of each energy bin from the center of the bin.

Parameter.Name: REPT FEDU
Parameter.Description: FEDU - Unidirectional Differential Electron Flux 2-60 MeV (energy-angle displays)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 12 electron energy bins.  Dimension 2 holds 18 pitch angles.

Parameter.Name: REPT FEDU
Parameter.Description: ---> FEDU - Unidirectional Differential Electron Flux 2-60 MeV (spectrogram at 18 fixed pitch angles)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 12 electron energy bins.  Dimension 2 holds 18 pitch angles.

Parameter.Name: REPT FEDU
Parameter.Description: ---> FEDU - Unidirectional Differential Electron Flux 2-60 MeV (spectrogram at up to 12 fixed energies)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 12 electron energy bins.  Dimension 2 holds 18 pitch angles.

Parameter.Name: REPT FEDU
Parameter.Description: ---> FEDU - Unidirectional Differential Electron Flux 2-60 MeV (vs Lstar at up to 12 fixed energies)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 12 electron energy bins.  Dimension 2 holds 18 pitch angles.

Parameter.Name: REPT FEDU
Parameter.Description: ---> FEDU - Unidirectional Differential Electron Flux 2-60 MeV (time series)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 12 electron energy bins.  Dimension 2 holds 18 pitch angles.

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Energy
Parameter.Caveats: The centers of the electron energy bins.  The Value Uncertainty contains the plus/minus range for each bin.

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Energy_DELTA_VAR
Parameter.Caveats: The plus/minus width of each energy bin from the center of the bin.

Parameter.Name: REPT FEDU_Lstar
Parameter.Description: ---> FEDU_Lstar - Lstar values for each pitchangle bin in FEDU
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 18pitch angles.

Parameter.Name: REPT FPDO
Parameter.Description: [EMPTY] FPDO - Omnidirectional Differential Proton Flux 21-116 MeV (spectrograms)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 8 proton energy bins.

Parameter.Name: REPT FPDO
Parameter.Description: ---> FPDO - Omnidirectional Differential Proton Flux 21-116 MeV (stacked time series)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 8 proton energy bins.

Parameter.Name: FPDO_Energy
Parameter.Caveats: The centers of the proton energy bins.  The Value Uncertainty contains the plus/minus range for each bin.

Parameter.Name: FPDO_Energy_DELTA_VAR
Parameter.Caveats: The plus/minus width of each energy bin from the center of the bin.

Parameter.Name: REPT FPDU
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 8 proton energy bins.  Dimension 2 holds 36 sectors.

Parameter.Name: REPT FPDU
Parameter.Description: ---> FPDU - Unidirectional Differential Proton Flux (spectrograms at up to 36 fixed angle)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 8 proton energy bins.  Dimension 2 holds 36 sectors.

Parameter.Name: REPT FPDU
Parameter.Description: ---> FPDU - Unidirectional Differential Proton Flux (spectrograms at 8 fixed energies)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 8 proton energy bins.  Dimension 2 holds 36 sectors.

Parameter.Name: REPT FPDU
Parameter.Description: ---> FPDU - Unidirectional Differential Proton Flux (time series)
Parameter.Caveats: Dimension 1 corresponds to 8 proton energy bins.  Dimension 2 holds 36 sectors.

Parameter.Name: FPDU_Energy
Parameter.Caveats: The centers of the proton energy bins.  The Value Uncertainty contains the plus/minus range for each bin.

Parameter.Name: FPDU_Energy_DELTA_VAR
Parameter.Caveats: The plus/minus width of each energy bin from the center of the bin.

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Alpha
Parameter.Description: The center of each defined pitch angle bin.
Parameter.Caveats: There are 18 pitch angle bins defined.

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Alpha_DELTA_VAR
Parameter.Description: The plus/minus range from the center of each potch angle bin.
Parameter.Caveats: Each pitch angle bin covers 10 degrees.  The range from the center is plus/minus 5 degrees.
